title: Pakistan special envoy on Afghanistan calls on PM
content:
ISLAMABAD, Dec 30 (APP): Pakistanâ€™s Special Representative on Afghanistan Muhammad Sadiq Khan on Monday called on Prime Minister Shehbaz Sharif here.
In the meeting, Sadiq Khan briefed the prime minister about his recent visit to Afghanistan, according to a PM Office press release.
Special Assistant to PM Tariq Fatemi also attended the meeting.
